Sentinel Starden:
May the star song bring you happiness! I'm Starden, and I'm guarding this forest and the Mother Tree.
I may look gloomy, and I'm terribly sorry for that. Previously I was an optimistic and fun-loving person, but unfortunately the war changed that. During the last fight for the Dungeon I witnessed Dark Elves slaughtering my comrades... I've tried to forget that scene, but I still see nightmares.
